title: DI Addons Object
description: (DRAFT) -- This object holds extension/addon objects to be embedded in the CDM JSON.

additionalProperties.title: Addon Data
additionalProperties.description:
All addon objects should be named ADDON_[name]. This naming may be enforced in future versions of OpenAPI.  
Addons must have a UUID and owner information, to mitigate addon naming collisions.

owner.title: Addon Owner
owner.description: Holds info about the owning entity for this addon. Typically a vendor or similar.

uuid.title: Owner UUID
uuid.description: This UUID should identify the owner across all of their addons.

name.title: Owner Name
name.description: Human-readable name associated with the above owner UUID

data.title: Addon Data
data.description: All addon data goes here. Information stored here is not standardized. Structure determined by addon owners.

$schema.title: Addon schema
$schema.description: If the addon creator has defined a JSON Schema for this addon, this field should contain the URI for that schema.
